mapper.select: select distinct re.id as request_id, re.request_intern_status, re.created_datetime as request_datetime, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone, inn.id as intern_notice_id, inn.intern_notice_title, inn.company_id, f.id as resumeFileId, f.file_path, f.file_name from tbl_request_intern re join tbl_user u on re.member_id = u.id join tbl_intern_notice inn on re.intern_notice_id = inn.id left join tbl_member_storage_file msf on msf.member_id = u.id left join tbl_file f on msf.file_id = f.id where re.member_id = #{memberId} and inn.id = #{internNoticeId} order by re.id desc limit 1

select f.id, f.file_origin_name, f.file_path, f.file_name from tbl_request_intern re join tbl_request_intern_file rif on re.id = rif.request_intern_id join tbl_file f on rif.file_id = f.id where re.member_id = #{memberId} and re.intern_notice_id = #{internNoticeId}

select re.id as request_id, re.member_id as user_id, re.request_intern_status, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone, re.created_datetime from tbl_request_intern re join tbl_user u on re.member_id = u.id where re.intern_notice_id = #{internNoticeId} order by re.id desc
